Cost of products sold restructuring and merger and integration.
Total costs related to goods produced and sold during the reporting period, excluding restructuring and merger and integration costs.

The charge against earnings in the period, comprised of costs associated with restructuring activities pursuant to a duly authorized plan and merger and integration activities, excluding a discontinued operation as defined by generally accepted accounting principles. Costs of restructuring activities include those for one-time termination benefits, severance costs associated with established compensation plans, termination of contracts, consolidating or closing facilities, and relocating employees, but exclude costs associated with the retirement of long-lived assets. Costs of merger and integration are expensed as incurred and exclude costs related to cost of products sold.

Principal balance as of the balance sheet date of amount due under terms of loan agreements with the Trustee of the ESOP for purchase by the ESOP of the Company's common shares. Amounts due are secured by the unallocated shares of the plan and are payable as a condition of allocating shares to participants.

cf.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic

The amount of expense recognized in the current period for accelerated depreciation on (1) long-lived assets associated with the exit from or disposal of business activities or restructurings pursuant to a program that is planned and controlled by management, and materially changes either the scope of a business undertaken by an entity, or the manner in which that business is conducted and on (2) long-lived assets associated with business combinations and integration activities.
Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Award Requisite Service Period

Noncash portion of amount charged against earnings in the period for incurred and estimated costs, excluding depreciation charges and asset retirement obligations, associated with exit from or disposal of business activities or restructurings pursuant to a program that is planned and controlled by management, and materially changes either the scope of a business undertaken by an entity, or the manner in which that business is conducted.

Deferred Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Continuing Operations [Abstract]
Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
The cash inflow from interest rate swaps terminated during the period, which are classified as operating activities.

The increase (decrease) during the period in the amount due for or receivable from taxes based on the reporting entity's earnings or attributable to the entity's income earning process (business presence) within a given jurisdiction.

Costs of restructuring activities include those for one-time termination benefits, severance costs associated with established compensation plans, termination of contracts, consolidating or closing facilities, and relocating employees, but exclude costs associated with the retirement of long-lived assets. Costs of merger and integration are expensed as incurred and exclude costs related to cost of products sold.
